title: About Me
text:
Hello! I‚Äôm Yiwei Lu, a Business Analytics graduate from UC Irvine with a passion for turning data into actionable insights.

Current Student Analyst @ Johnson & Johnson (Jan 2025 - Jun 2025)
Business Analyst @ CalHome Inc (Oct 2021 - July 2024)
Consultant Internship  @ Fly Media (Shanghai) (May 2019 - Aug 2019)





M.S. in Business Analytics, University of California, Irvine (Expected June 2025)
B.S. in Computer Information Systems, California State Polytechnic University, Pomona (May 2021)






Languages & Tools:
Proficient in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn), SQL (complex queries, joins, CTEs), R for statistical computing, and SPSS for data analysis. Experienced in Tableau for interactive dashboarding and Google Analytics for website traffic and campaign performance insights.
Cloud Platforms & Databases:
Hands-on experience with cloud environments such as AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda) and Microsoft Azure. Comfortable working with both SQL and NoSQL databases, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, for scalable data storage and retrieval.
Data Management & Analysis:
Skilled in using Microsoft Excel (advanced formulas, pivot tables, VBA) and Microsoft Access for business reporting. Familiar with processing large datasets and integrating big data systems to extract trends and drive strategic decisions.
Soft Skills & Collaboration:
Strong time management and organizational skills with a proven ability to work independently under tight deadlines. Highly adaptable, with a collaborative mindset and a solution-oriented approach to problem-solving across cross-functional teams.






Mandarin Chinese: Native proficiency

English: Professional working proficiency






To bridge the gap between raw data and strategic decision-making, empowering businesses to make smarter, faster, and more informed choices.
I believe data is more than numbers ‚Äî it‚Äôs a narrative waiting to be uncovered. My mission is to transform complex datasets into clear, actionable insights that drive meaningful business outcomes. Whether it‚Äôs forecasting trends, optimizing operations, or identifying growth opportunities, I aim to provide tools and analysis that turn uncertainty into confident decision-making.
With every project, I strive to combine analytical precision with business intuition ‚Äî ensuring that data not only informs but inspires.

title: Projects
text:

Repositioning Google Pixel ‚Äî A Strategic Marketing Analysis
A strategic marketing project focused on diagnosing Google Pixel‚Äôs weak market share despite strong AI and camera technology. We analyzed brand positioning, competitive threats, and proposed data-driven solutions to strengthen Pixel 9‚Äôs presence in the premium smartphone market.

title: Projects
text:
ü©∫ Anemia ML Prediction
Predicting Anemia with Machine Learning
This project uses blood test data to train models (Decision Trees, Logistic Regression) for anemia prediction. After feature selection and applying SMOTE, we achieved up to 100% recall, aiding early medical detection.
